_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
rationale: Low cost, max profit if SPY pins at 600

entry_conditions.notes: Long butterfly: low cost, defined risk bet on price pin at middle strike. Works well in low-IV environments (cheap to enter). Best when you expect price to settle at a specific level.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Width of one wing - net debit (at middle strike at expiry)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Price convergence toward middle strike at expiration
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Theta â€” positive near expiry when price is near center, negative far from expiry

greeks_profile.theta: slightly positive near expiry if price near center, negative far out
greeks_profile.vega: negative near expiry â€” profits from IV decrease as expiry approaches
greeks_profile.gamma: positive far from expiry, negative near expiry at center â€” risk reversal near expiry

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Price pins at middle strike (600) at expiration. Maximum profit achieved. Low cost entry means small loss if wrong.
